about_the_game:
The Season Four Table Pack includes all TEN of the tables in Season Four as they are released for the discounted price of $29.99 (40% off the normal price).

Season Four includes The Addams Family®, Starship troopers™, Phantom of the Opera™, Party Zone™, Earthshaker™, Cyclone™, Jack*Bot™, Xenon, Red and Ted's Roadshow™, and Safe Cracker™.
detailed_description:
The Season Four Table Pack includes all TEN of the tables in Season Four as they are released for the discounted price of $29.99 (40% off the normal price).

Season Four includes The Addams Family®, Starship troopers™, Phantom of the Opera™, Party Zone™, Earthshaker™, Cyclone™, Jack*Bot™, Xenon, Red and Ted's Roadshow™, and Safe Cracker™.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX Lion or Mavericks
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.8GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0+ support
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Pinball Arcade: Season Four Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 ghz or better.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c and Shader Model 3.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound capable card.
